description: Returns details about the landing zone. Displays a message in case of error.

parameters.name: landingZoneIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the landing zone.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the landing zone.

nested_items.name: driftStatus
nested_items.description: The drift status of the landing zone.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The drift status of the landing zone.
DRIFTED: The landing zone deployed in this configuration does not match the configuration that Amazon Web Services Control Tower expected.
IN_SYNC: The landing zone deployed in this configuration matches the configuration that Amazon Web Services Control Tower expected.

nested_items.name: latestAvailableVersion
nested_items.description: The latest available version of the landing zone.

nested_items.name: manifest
nested_items.description: The landing zone manifest JSON text file that specifies the landing zone configurations.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The landing zone deployment status. One of ACTIVE, PROCESSING, FAILED.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The landing zone's current deployed version.
